description.@en: With but a touch, you imbue a weapon with righteous might.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, a weapon you touch gains the ability to strike enemies that may be normally unharmed by non-Magickal weapons.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you can anoint up to three weapons instead.

criticalFailure.@en: Your call to bless a weapon has angered gods unknown, as you now suffer from a terrible curse. For the next 24 hours, you must add an additional [[/roll 1D6]] Chaos Die to all Magicks you cast.

reagents.@en: Three drops of holy water dabbed upon the weapon (expended)

system.distance: Any one weapon you can touch
